title: What the fuck is up with displacements? They weren't always like this were they?
body: This shit is fucking obnoxious, not only have they constantly added more and more CC to the game, apparently knockups/knockbacks are stunning you for like an entire fucking second now, I just had to lane against a gragas and boy was it fun, let me tell you, to have literally no way to trade with him BECAUSE I WAS UNABLE TO MAKE MY CHAMPION DO ANYTHING.
